channel.title: Code Coverage :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Code Coverage It is often helpful to examine the code coverage of our unit tests. Thankfully, there is an easy way to enable that in our project using the c8 library. So, we can start by installing it: $ npm install --save-dev c8 Once it is installed, we can simply add it to a new script in the package.json file that will run our tests with code coverage:
